name: 3.4.1.40. Wealthy Immigrant (Settlement)

cf.path: Map Notes#/CF_SEP/PFRPG - Kingdom Building - GM Version

content: A rich merchant or a noble from another land is impressed with your kingdom and asks to construct a Mansion (01-75) or Noble Villa (76-100) in the settlement at no cost to you. If you allow it, the building provides its normal benefits to your kingdom.
